trans-unit.source: Represents an orthographic projection camera.
trans-unit.target: 表示正交投影摄像机。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies an orthogonal projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface.
trans-unit.target: 此类指定的正交投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]可视化图面。

trans-unit.source: Like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, it specifies a position, viewing direction, and "upward" direction.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，它指定位置、 查看方向和"向上"方向。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, however, OrthographicCamera describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，但是，OrthographicCamera 描述不包含透视收缩投影。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>

trans-unit.source: In other words, OrthographicCamera describes a viewing box whose sides are parallel, instead of one whose sides meet in a point at the scene's horizon.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，OrthographicCamera 描述边是并行的而不是一个边满足在场景的水平分割点中的查看框。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示正交投影和透视缩短相机投影之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正射透视投影](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "射透视投影")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref> class with the specified position, projection direction, upward direction, and width.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>类具有指定的位置、 投影方向、 向上方向和宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> that specifies the camera position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> ，它指定的照相机的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the direction of the camera's projection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> ，它指定的照相机的投影的方向。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the upward direction according to the perspective of the onlooker.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> ，它指定根据观察的角度来看的向上方向。

trans-unit.source: The width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 世界单位中的照相机的查看框宽度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的照相机的查看框的宽度以世界单位。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening, its viewing box has parallel sides.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>描述不包含透视投影收缩，其查看框具有并行的边。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>

trans-unit.source: The width of the viewing box can therefore be specified with a single value.
trans-unit.target: 因此可以使用单个值指定查看框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示正交投影和透视缩短相机投影之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.WidthProperty>| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![正射透视投影](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "射透视投影")# # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.WidthProperty>| |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.WidthProperty>

trans-unit.source: Width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 世界单位中的照相机的查看框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
